channel.title: CIS PE Chapter – Skills Tracks
channel.description: Recent content in Skills Tracks on CIS PE Chapter

item.title: Docs: Engineer Track
item.description:
Overview

  • 6 week facilitated program, delivered as 4 x 1 week sprints and 1 x 2 week sprint
  • Focuses on some core cloud competencies
  • Introduces OpenShift platform
  • Achieve vendor accreditation
  • Show + tell for graduation

Pre-requisits

You will need to have an understanding of cloud technologies including: Compute, IaaS, PaaS, Network, Storage, Security essentials, etc.

You will need an understanding of code scripting.

Objectives & Key Results (OKRs)

Enable our Customers to build & operate platforms in hybrid cloud environments.

Key results - Skills

  • Agile practice, Infrastructure as Code, Cloud Providers, Container Platforms
  • Infrastrudcture as Code
  • OpenShift architecture

Key results - Certification

  • RedHat Delivery Specialist - OpenShift Container Platform 4
  • Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900); or AWS SysOps admin; or Google Associate Cloud Engineer

Track outline

item.title: Docs: Senior Engineer Track
item.description:
Overview

  • Core review & deployment of modern platform
  • Focused on advanced skills & new products/services
  • 6 week self-paced program, 2 week sprints
  • Show & tell + Examination for graduation.

Pre-requisits

You should be an Engineering Track graduate or have experience with all elements of Eng. track. You should get stuck in to K8s the hard way and the SRE workbook.

Goal

  • RedHat OpenShift 4 Foundation certification

Sprint 0

Sprint 1+

Goal

  • AWS DevOps Pro; or Azure DevOps; or Google DevOps Pro
  • Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Administration

item.title: Docs: Supporting activities
item.description:
Tech Challenge

Open to all practice members & to encourage others

CCP Rotation

Enhance skills away from customer environments

Tech Briefings

On-going ‘lunch & learn’ of different technology components
